Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class Warehouse

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Warehouse
public class Warehouse
extends java.lang.Object
Warehouse is player's warehouse. It has two attributes: a WarehouseDepot[3] warehouseDepots and an ArrayList ExtraDepot which is initialized after player actives an ExtraDepotLeaderCard.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Warehouse()
    the constructor creates 3 new WarehouseDepot with 1, 2 and 3 as maxAmount, and put them in order in warehouseDepots.

  • Method Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Warehouse

      public Warehouse()
      the constructor creates 3 new WarehouseDepot with 1, 2 and 3 as maxAmount, and put them in order in warehouseDepots.

  • Method Details

    • existExtraDepot

      public boolean existExtraDepot()
      Returns:
      if extraDepots has been initialized.

    • addExtraDepot

      public void addExtraDepot​(Resource resource)
      Parameters:
      resource - stands for the resource of new ExtraDepot which has to be added in extraDepots. if extraDepots wasn't previously initialized, it creates a new ArrayList ExtraDepot.

    • getNumOfResource

      public int getNumOfResource​(Resource resource)
      Parameters:
      resource - stands for the type of resource to count.
      Returns:
      the count of @param resource in the Warehouse. If exists an ExtraDepot it calculate both in extraDepots. and warehouseDepotList, otherwise only in warehouseDepots. If @param resource is not in Warehouse @return 0.

    • increaseResource

      public int increaseResource​(Resource resource)
      Parameters:
      resource - stands for the type of resource to increase by 1 in Warehouse.
      Returns:
      in which depot @param resource is increased, otherwise @return -1. the method increases in the correct ExtraDepot, otherwise in the correct WarehouseDepot, otherwise in the first empty WarehouseDepot.

    • decreaseResource

      public int decreaseResource​(Resource resource, int amount)
      Parameters:
      resource - stands for the type of resource to decrease in Warehouse.
      amount - stands for the amount of @param resource to decrease.
      Returns:
      0 if in Warehouse there are enough resources, otherwise @return the amount of not decreased resource. this method firstly decreases in warehouseDepots and, if necessary, in extraDepots.

    • switchDepots

      public void switchDepots​(int depot1, int depot2) throws ImpossibleSwitchDepotException
      Parameters:
      depot1 - stands for position of the first Depot in Warehouse to switch.
      depot2 - stands for position of the second Depot in Warehouse to switch.
      Throws:
      ImpossibleSwitchDepotException - if the switch is not possible. this method switch two Depot. if @param is 0 stands for the first WarehouseDepot, 1 for the second one, 2 for the third one, 3 for the first ExtraDepot, 4 for the second ExtraDepot.

    • sumWarehouseResource

      public int sumWarehouseResource()
      Returns:
      the sum of all resource in the Warehouse.
